did.head: Overview of the Collection

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Xavier University Archives and Special Collections

did.unittitle: Xavier University Library Committee minutes and related documents
did.abstract: Minutes of meetings and related documents of the Xavier University Library Committee.

bioghist.head: History of Xavier University Library Committee
bioghist.p: The committee has existed since at least 1946. It reviews and recommends policies and practices in the University Library.

This committee has served since at least 1946. The description of its responsibilities has changed over the years. It's charge as found in the Annual List of University Committees for 2010-11 was stated as the following: "The Committee: 1. Reviews and recommends new (or revisions to existing) library policies. 2. Receives and reviews periodic reports prepared by the Director of Content Management and Director of Discovery Services on its operations and makes recommendations based on these reports. 3. Advises the Director of Content Management and Director of Discovery Services on budgetary matters and 4. At the request of the Academic Vice President/Provost or the Associate Vice President of Information Resources participates in the evaluation of Library operations."

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Meeting minutes and related documents from the Xavier University Library Committee.

arrangement.head: Statement of Arrangement
arrangement.p: Materials are arranged into folders chronologically.

separatedmaterial.head: Separated Material
separatedmaterial.p: Some digitized Library Committee minutes can be found in the Xavier Archives Permanent Retention Drive.

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions on Access
accessrestrict.p: Restricted access. Please contact the Xavier University Archives staff.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Box Number, Folder Number, XUA-23, Library Committee minutes and related documents, Special Collections and University Archives, Xavier University Library, Cincinnati, Ohio.

controlaccess.head: Indexing Terms
controlaccess.p: The following terms have been used to index the description of this collection in the library's online public access catalog.
